Description: On VA-164 in the City of Portsmouth, in the vicinity of the ramp from VA-164, near APM Terminal, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 622 East in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of Telegraph Springs Rd; Rt. 611N/S (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 5.9 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
